settings.text:
All of our products are made by hand in Europe with the finest European and American leathers as well as authentic cork and wooden sole bases. 

Founded in 1846, Sandgrens has a deep and rich history as a footwear brand and wholesale distributor throughout the United States, Europe, Asia and Australia. We take great pride in both our handmade quality and rich history as one of the few brands that continue to produce all of our products in Europe.

Did you know, our Clog Masters have over 100 years combined experience in making the most authentic and best clogs with wooden soles available. Each of our clogs is made by hand which creates the uniqueness our customers strive for.

Although our factory is large and we have the ability to produce in large quantities, we aim to fulfill our niche within the industry as a footwear brand that forgoes the business model often found in Asia-high volume production with low quality materials and a complete lack of brand identity.

We take extreme pride in making products in lower volumes by the hand of Clog Masters who have become icons within the profession. We do all of this with the best leathers and wooden clog bases available throughout Europe. Whether you are a large retailer or small boutique we are happy to talk with you about what makes our clogs and boots special and how we can work together to bring Sandgrens into your retail store. 

As with any decision to carry a product line, we understand that you likely have a few questions about how the wholesale sales process looks, delivery times, clog selections and fitting for both clogs and clog boots. Whether you are new to clogs or have carried them for many years, we will work with you every step along the way!
